name: plusmeta
description:
PlusMeta is a financial product developed based on the underlying blockchain architecture of the MetaBox wallet, designed to create more value for everyone.
⭐ No Time and Regional Limitations, Secure Financial Management of Cryptocurrencies
Enjoy global cryptocurrency financial management immediately! Your global digital asset financial management expert is now online!
⭐ Seamless Bridge between PlusMeta and MetaBox Wallet
Link your wallet with the financial application in just one click, with no need to create an additional wallet. You can also create a new address within the app, seamlessly integrating it with the wallet.
⭐ Comprehensive Security Protection Technology
Supports 12/15/18/21/24/36-word mnemonic phrases in Chinese/English/Traditional Chinese for backup and recovery;
Set an 8-digit wallet password and use fingerprint verification for identity authentication, providing you with secondary protection;
BFMeta/PayMetaChain/BFChainV2/ETHMeta/BFChain/CCChain networks support setting on-chain transaction passwords for double encryption of assets;
Private keys are encrypted and securely stored locally on your phone, with multiple private key backup options to ensure they are never lost.
⭐ Support for the Most Popular Cryptocurrency Wallets:
Ethereum ETH
Binance BSN
TRON TRX
BFMeta BFM
ETHMeta ETHM
PayMetachain PMC
CCChain CCC
BFChainV2 BFT
BFChain BFT
Download PlusMeta for the ultimate metaverse cryptocurrency wallet experience.
release_date: Fri May 31 2024 20:41:17 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间)
author: @PlusMeta
@plus-meta.com
